name: IpCGPenaltyData
brief:
Algorithm state data for Chen-Goldfarb penalty method

CGPenaltyData extends IpoptAdditionalData to store all state
specific to the Chen-Goldfarb penalty function algorithm.

Stored directions:
- delta_cgpen_: Standard Chen-Goldfarb search direction
- delta_cgfast_: Fast (pure Newton) direction when near solution

Penalty parameters:
- curr_penalty_: Current line search penalty parameter (rho)
- curr_kkt_penalty_: Penalty for KKT system scaling
- curr_penalty_pert_: Current perturbation factor

Algorithm control:
- never_try_pure_Newton_: Flag to disable fast direction
- restor_iter_: Iteration count for restoration tracking
- max_alpha_x_: Recorded primal step size

The data is accessed via IpData().AdditionalData() and cast
to CGPenaltyData using the CGPenData() accessor pattern.
